title: Rengar needs a nerf lmao
body: Don't think it's right that he can build full tank and 1shot anyone on the map

replies.body: Well that would be, because he can't.

well he can't build full tank and 1shot, but I've covered in another post on a similar discussion with the calculations as to why, building rengar with 2-3 tank items, around half of his items, is actually amazing if you can get a bit of an early lead. I did the calculations with empowered w which did less damage but provided cc immunity which worked well because he'd 1shot, be tanky enough to survive any retaliative burst whilst being impossible to lockdown or peel and he'd run away with stormraiders; but now without cc immunity, his empowered w combo isn't really that good for diving and is more defensive and this means he's alot more manageable.


Still, unless you're a pro, rengar should still be building half tanky with say a deadmans, spirit visage and GA or other defensive item because he doesn't need that many damage items to be able to kill a squishy target with a rotation of  spells.

An assassin doesn't need to build full damage, optimally, the assassin should build enough damage to 'assassinate' the target and then build the rest with as much durability as possible.

Also assassins generally can't burst tanks, unless riot really screws up with their numbers. Current rengar is far from able to 1v1 a full health tank nautilus, though I'm not sure about when he had that bug with rengar passive back on his reworked version release. 

Anyways rengar is far more tame now and they've nerfed everything I personally feel was broken about him and maybe just a little bit more, so until I get my face ripped off by a mastery 7 knife cat, I personally feel he's not at all broken.
